details:
* [CVE-2017-5668](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2017-5668)
Fix for incomplete fix for Null pointer dereference with file
 transfer request from unknown contacts.
 (Though this package wasn't in Wheezy with this issue, I
 mention it here.
 The fix was done with the second patch for [CVE-2016-10189](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-10189))
* [CVE-2016-10189](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-10189)
Null pointer dereference with file transfer request from unknown
 contacts.
* [CVE-2016-10188](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2016-10188)
deactivate any incoming file transfer for bitlbee
 This affects any libpurple protocol when used through BitlBee. It
 does not affect other libpurple-based clients such as pidgin.


For Debian 7 Wheezy, these issues have been fixed in bitlbee version 3.0.5-1.2+deb7u1
